q: Chrysler just started making its refreshed 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country in Windsor, Ontario, today but Fiat/Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne was already pondering the next-generation van. We need to completely rethink the minivan, he told the AP's Dee-Ann Durbin at the plant in Canada. "We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile." If we have a billion people using Android, you think we can't make money from that? he asked. We know at least one person who's working on making money off of Android. According to

NBA.com staff reports-- Allen Iverson 's season is over. The Detroit Red Pistons said Friday the All-Star guard will miss the rest of the season-- and the playoffs if they make it-- because of a sore back. After talking with Allen Iverson and our medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time, Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team. Gabrielle Giffords is making "remarkable progress" as she recovers from last month's shooting in Tucson and has started speaking, making specific requests for food and talking to loved ones. They're short sentences but specific, and very communicative, said Kirsten Gillibrand about Gabrielle Giffords ' progress.
